headline: EQNR Secures Contract to Supply Gas to Eneco for Netherlands
summary: Equinor ASA signs a five-year gas deal with Eneco to supply up to 0.5 bcm a year from 2026, pairing deliveries with low-carbon origin certificates.

headline: This Week In Energy Transition - Thailand's Green Energy Surge Fueled by GULF Investment
summary: Gulf Development Public Company Limited (GULF) has secured THB 60 billion (approximately USD 1.9 billion) to invest in a portfolio of 27 renewable energy projects aimed at supporting Thailand's energy transition. The financing will fund solar, Solar BESS, and industrial waste-to-energy projects with a combined contracted generation capacity of 939 MW. These projects align with Thailand's national goal of achieving Net Zero Emissions by 2050 and underscore the vital role of private sector...

headline: The Trump administration is touting approvals for oil-exporting hubs in the Gulf of Mexico—but no one seems to want to build them

headline: Chevron Leadership Shifts And New Deals Shape Valuation And Growth Outlook
summary: Chevron (NYSE:CVX) announces a series of senior leadership changes across strategy, trading, operations, and the board. The company appoints a new independent director alongside multiple executive retirements and promotions. Chevron signs new offshore oil and gas exploration agreements in Syria. The company enters a new collaboration focused on global exploration with Turkey's state oil company. Chemicals, refining, and global upstream operations are core to Chevron's identity, and...
